senses.definition:
Core-evolutionary response to stimulus that gives feelings of sensation to guide behavior without using higher levels of advanced intelligence as a form of instinctual survival and presevation of the species. 
	Example: Maternal instinct operates on pure emotion, without accessing higher human brain function,  to protect young from harm.
examples: A soul is what separates humans from animals.
Evil people do not have a soul and are not more evolved than animals.
